pages.text: The modpack contains a few mods that slightly change some of the mechanics in the game; these are explained here for your awareness.

pages.title: Graves
pages.text: In this pack, you will inevitably die. No worries though, since whatever you had with you will still be in a grave, and your death position will be marked on the map. Getting there can be a challenge, but at least your things won't despawn! A grave will be generated even if you fall into the void, in which case it will end up at height Y=1.

pages.title: Fence Jumping
pages.text: You can jump over fences. To do so, simply stand in front of a fence and jump - you'll jump somewhat higher than normal. Don't worry about your animal farm: only players can do this!

pages.title: Nether Portal Fix
pages.text: Tired of going back through your Nether Portal and then ending up in an different place? A solution has been added, so this should no longer happen. You'll always end up back at the portal you came through at the first place. No more nasty surprises!

pages.title: Slab Placement
pages.text: Thanks to Klee Slabs, when placing slabs next to an existing wall, you can choose whether to place it in the top or bottom half of the block: if the mouse is pointing to the top half of the side of a block, the slab will be placed upside down.

pages.title: Sleeping
pages.text: SlayerCraft contains the Morpheus mod, which provides a new sleeping mechanic: if most of the players in the server want to sleep, the day will pass. Additionally, if you end up stuck in a bed after sleeping, you can kick yourself from the server so you can re-join without having to wait.

pages.title: Ore Excavation
pages.text: If a tool is enchanted with an $(thing)Excavate Enchantment$(), it can be used to excavate entire ore veins or chop complete trees. Higher Excavate levels will allow more blocks to be excavated. To excavate, press and hold $(k:oreexcavation.key.excavate) and mine one of the blocks. To switch shape, press $(k:oreexcavation.key.shape).

pages.title: Carry It!
pages.text: Blocks such as vanilla spawners, chests, ... can be grabben, even though they cannot be mined normally. To do so, press and hold $(k:carry.desc) and right-click the block. This functionality is provided by the $(thing)Carry On$() mod.
